    • Method Detail

      • movie

        IVideo movie(ResourceLoadInfo loadInfo)
      throws java.io.IOException
        Starts a full-screen video.
        Parameters:
        loadInfo - Filename of the requested resource and related metadata.
        Returns:
        An IVideo object that can be used to control playback.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an I/O error occurs while opening the video file for reading.

      • getBlocking

        @CheckForNull
IVideo getBlocking()
        Returns:
        The currently playing full-screen video, or null if there's no full-screen video currently playing.

      • setVideoResolution

        void setVideoResolution(nl.weeaboo.common.Dim desiredSize)
        Changes the desired video resolution (width x height). Videos are loaded from the resource folder that most closely matches the desired size.

      • getVideoFiles

        java.util.Collection<nl.weeaboo.filesystem.FilePath> getVideoFiles(nl.weeaboo.filesystem.FilePath folder)
        Returns the paths for all video files in the specified folder and its sub-folders.
